com.mobius.vdrapi
Class DocumentServer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.DocumentServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDocumentServer, INode
public abstract class DocumentServer
extends Object
implements IDocumentServer

This abstract class provides some of the common functions found in all document servers.

Method Detail

changePassword

public void changePassword(String oldPassword,
                           String newPassword,
                           String newRecipient)
                    throws AuthenticationException,
                           ViewDirectException
Changes the password on the document server for the current recipient.

Specified by:
changePassword in interface IDocumentServer
Parameters:
oldPassword - the existing password used to verify the current recipient.
newPassword - the new password for this recipient.
newRecipient - the recipient whose credentials are being verified. If the current recipient is the same as the new recipient, the password for the document server is also changed.

To obtain the current recipient and password, use IDocumentServer.getRecipient() and IDocumentServer.getPassword(). To unconditionally set the password for the document server, use IDocumentServer.setPassword(java.lang.String).

Note that subsequent calls to IDocumentServer.getPassword() or IDocumentServer.getPassword() may not reflect the values used in this call.

Throws:
AuthenticationException - thrown if errors occur when validating the current recipient.
ViewDirectException - thrown if errors occur when changing the password.

existsInProfile

public boolean existsInProfile()
Determines whether this document server exists in the profile. If it does not, the SetFunctions do not write any data for this document server.

getAllowMixedCaseLogin

public boolean getAllowMixedCaseLogin()
Determines if Mixed Case Login is allowed

getFactory

public IListFactory getFactory()
Returns the factory type for this node. DocumentServer objects always have DocumentServerFactory as their factory type.

Specified by:
getFactory in interface INode

getKeyValue

public Object getKeyValue()
Returns the key value for this node. The Document Server key value is the name of the document server.

Specified by:
getKeyValue in interface INode

getPassword

public String getPassword()
Returns the unencrypted password stored in the profile for this document server.

Specified by:
getPassword in interface IDocumentServer

getPromptForRecipientIDandPassword

public boolean getPromptForRecipientIDandPassword()
Determines if a prompt for the password is required. If the password is not stored in the document server profile, it must be prompted for.

Specified by:
getPromptForRecipientIDandPassword in interface IDocumentServer

getProtocol

public abstract DocumentServerProtocol getProtocol()
Returns the connection protocol used by this document server. This also forces subclasses to implement the protocol.

Specified by:
getProtocol in interface IDocumentServer

getRecipient

public String getRecipient()
Returns the Recipient ID stored in the profile for this document server.

Specified by:
getRecipient in interface IDocumentServer

getVisibleValue

public String getVisibleValue()
Returns the visible value for this node. The Document Server visible value is the document server name.

Specified by:
getVisibleValue in interface INode

refresh

public void refresh()
             throws DataInvalidException,
                    DataIOException
Refreshes the internal state of this node. For a document server object, this function may be called if the profile was changed.

Specified by:
refresh in interface INode
DataInvalidException
DataIOException

remove

public void remove()
            throws DataIOException
Removes this document server from the profile. A DocumentServerFactory uses this function to delete a document server.

DataIOException

setPassword

public void setPassword(String newPassword)
                 throws DataIOException
Stores a password in the profile for the document server. The input to this function is not encrypted until it is stored in the profile.
